officialTitle: A Psychomotor Recuperation Study After Deep Sedation for Colonoscopy Between Target Controlled and Manual Titration of Propofol.
inclusionCriteria:
* All patients subjected to deep sedation in ambulant care, having a colonoscopy
* ASA 1-3
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Dementia.
* Gastroscopy planned at the same time.
* Allergies to propofol
* All cases were a 'full stomach' is suspected (gastric banding)
* Pregnancy
